CustomField.description: This contact will default as the Timesheet Approver, Expense Claim Approver, Leave Approver and Client Hiring Manager on the creation of a 2cloudnine Assignment record if the related approver fields are left blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This contact will default as the Timesheet Approver, Expense Claim Approver, Leave Approver and Client Hiring Manager on the creation of a 2cloudnine Assignment record if the related approver fields are left blank.
CustomField.label: Default Assignment Contact
